pricing.title: Choose your plan
pricing.subtitle: Simple, transparent packages — choose the plan that fits your journey.
pricing.keywords: business plan pricing, funding packages, transparent pricing, affordable plans
pricing.addonPackDesc: Rush first draft (target 3 business days) + one extra revision + help filling one standard submission form (aws/FFG/WA/bank/visa) using your plan content.
pricing.addonPackNote: Not included: legal/visa advice, additional revisions, custom modelling, portal setup. Decisions are made by providers.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get from idea to funded in three simple steps
